# 占卜

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xuanxue-zhanbu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xuanxue-zhanbu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xuanxue-zhanbu
xuanxue-zhanbu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xuanxue-zhanbu
xuanxue-zhanbu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
